accountId.description: Account ID for the custom dimension to update.

webPropertyId.description: Web property ID for the custom dimension to update.

customDimensionId.description: Custom dimension ID for the custom dimension to update.

ignoreCustomDataSourceLinks.description: Force the update and ignore any warnings related to the custom dimension being linked to a custom data source / data set.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: An opaque string that represents a user for quota purposes. Must not exceed 40 characters.

CustomDimension.description: JSON template for Analytics Custom Dimension.

active.description: Boolean indicating whether the custom dimension is active.

created.description: Time the custom dimension was created.

kind.description: Kind value for a custom dimension. Set to "analytics#customDimension". It is a read-only field.

parentLink.description: Parent link for the custom dimension. Points to the property to which the custom dimension belongs.

href.description: Link to the property to which the custom dimension belongs.

type.description: Type of the parent link. Set to "analytics#webproperty".

scope.description: Scope of the custom dimension: HIT, SESSION, USER or PRODUCT.

updated.description: Time the custom dimension was last modified.

$block: JSON template for Analytics Custom Dimension.

$ul: **active**: Boolean indicating whether the custom dimension is active.
**created**: Time the custom dimension was created.
**kind**: Kind value for a custom dimension. Set to "analytics#customDimension". It is a read-only field. (default: analytics#customDimension)
**parentLink**: Parent link for the custom dimension. Points to the property to which the custom dimension belongs.
**href**: Link to the property to which the custom dimension belongs.
**type**: Type of the parent link. Set to "analytics#webproperty". (default: analytics#webproperty)
**scope**: Scope of the custom dimension: HIT, SESSION, USER or PRODUCT.
**updated**: Time the custom dimension was last modified.
